mapper.insert: insert into member(memberId, passwd, name, zipcode, baseaddress, detailaddress, email, accountNumber, bank, phoneNumber) values(#{memberId}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{zipcode}, #{baseaddress}, #{detailaddress}, #{email}, #{accountNumber}, #{bank}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: update member set sessionid=#{sessionid}, sessionLimit=#{next} where memberId=#{memberId}
select * from member where sessionid=#{sessionid} and sessionlimit > now()
